dct_description_sm: Tourist map of Vatican City, and the adjoining districts of Rome, Italy, with Castel Sant'Angelo, showing places interests including buildings, churches, museums, monuments, hotels, restaurants, fountains, gardens, public transports, hospitals and post offices. Panel title. "Printed in Hungary 2013". "© GiziMap Hungary". "From Vatican to Castel Sant'Angelo - Roma historical centre 1:30 000 - city map"--On panel. Includes coat of arms of Vatican City on upper right margin, colour illustrations, locality map, and index of maps by GiziMap on panel.
